cards.title: BESTSELLERAssorted Mithai
cards.text: A box of 9 assorted mithai touched by the magic of mithai! Hand-made with love one by one.

cards.title: Chilli Cheese Bhujia (225g)
cards.text: Besan Bhujia tossed in the timeless combination of chilli & cheese! Each pack contains 225gms of Bhujia.

cards.title: Mithal Sweets
cards.text: A happy kitchen accident, this sharp edged dark chocolate and butterscotch brittle is loaded with crunch and nostalgia.

cards.title: chocko
cards.text: Our sweet take on the old school & traditional boondi laddu, an all-season treat! Hand-made with love one by one
